mdRecord.dcterms:title: The Washington Bronze Statue, and State House, Richmond, Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bell & Bro. (Washington, D.C.)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of equestrian statue of George Washington by Thomas Crawford in Capitol Square, Richmond, Virginia. Crawford was commissioned by the state of Virginia in 1849. Mounted on pink board. Figures at the base are Thomas Jefferson, John Marshall, Meriwether Lewis, Patrick Henry, George Mason and William Nelson. Photographed and published by Bell & Bro., No. 319 Penn Avenue, Washington, D. C.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Capitol Square (Richmond, Va.)
Washington, George, 1732-1799
